CustomField.description: Questions where the option N/A is chosen are given the maximum score
CustomField.formula:
CASE( Case_Origin__c , "Yes", 5, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Case_Source__c , "Yes", 8, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Case_Type__c , "Yes", 8, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Related_Product__c , "Yes", 5, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Sub_Analysis__c , "Yes", 5, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Case_Status__c , "Yes", 5, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Case_Priority__c , "Yes", 5, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Contact_Name__c , "Yes", 5, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Contact_Email__c , "Yes", 5, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Contact_Phone_Mobile__c , "Yes", 5, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Contact_Entitlement__c , "Yes", 8, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Contact_Against_Entitlement__c , "Yes", 8, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Timely_Within_SLA__c , "Yes", 8, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( KB_Attached__c , "Yes", 5, "No", 0,5)+ CASE( Is_KBA_relevant__c , "Yes", 5, "No", 0,5)+ CASE( KB_Recommended__c , "Yes", 5, "No", 0,5)+ CASE( Feedback_Provided__c , "Yes", 5, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Cause_Coded_Appropriately__c , "Yes", 5, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Solution_Coded_Appropriately__c , "Yes", 5, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Prevention_Filled_appropriate__c , "Yes", 6, "No", 0,0)+ CASE( Public_Comments__c , "Yes", 5, "No", 0,0)+
VALUE( TEXT ( Case_Subject_Meaningful__c ))+ VALUE( TEXT ( Detail_Description__c ))+ VALUE( TEXT ( Case_Comments__c ))+ VALUE( TEXT ( Solution__c ))+ VALUE( TEXT ( Relevant_Update__c ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Questions where the option N/A is chosen are given the maximum score
CustomField.label: Score (Case)
